subject: Re: [junit] Simple JUnit with Annotations not working
msgSnippet: ... I think that Ant 1.6.5 can t run JUnit 4 Tests without an Adapter. Ant 1.7.0 is the first JUnit 4-aware release, if I remember correctly. Greetings, Malte
messageBody:
surikoya wrote:
> I am trying the new annotations feature of JUnit4.
>
> Here is the program I am working with. I am using ant 1.6.5 and
> copied junit-4.6-RC1.jar to my <ant_home>/lib directory and put it in
> the classpath too. When I run the test I get a message which says
> "No Tests found in AnnotationsTest". Did I miss something basic?

I think that Ant 1.6.5 can't run JUnit 4 Tests without an Adapter.
Ant 1.7.0 is the first JUnit 4-aware release, if I remember correctly.

Greetings,
Malte
